verbs.description: beworry (third-person singular simple present beworries, present participle beworrying, simple past and past participle beworried)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To fill with worry; cause to be worried; beset with cares; trouble; vex; harass.
examples: Is there a death ? — it is no easy matter for an editor to select from the bundle of elegies he receives. Is there a shipwreck or any great national event ? — and the poor beworried nine are called upon to inspire a thousand pens, [...]
